name: Gun Runner (itch) (LastSmokeKiller)
description:
Created by - Caleb Niehues, Caleb Rosebaugh, Cole Griem, and Alex Heckey

This is an infinite run and gunner. Shoot gumbas while avoiding chargers. To pause, consume a life and be able to purchase upgrades. Getting hit will also consume lives and pause the game.

Left Click - Change Up/Down Direction

Right Click - Change Weapon

ESC - Pause/Unpause (Careful: Pausing costs you a life because you Can't Stop!)

 Can you last long enough to make it to the top of the leaderboard?
